about_the_game:
What comes to mind when you see jelly? Want to tap it? Then Jellitito is just for you! This fun clicker game lets you pick your favorite jelly look and dive into a meditative squishing experience.

With appealing graphics, calming music, and captivating jelly jiggles with every click, what could be better for unwinding after a long day? Play, relax, and collect a unique jelly collection!

Jellitito is a simple anti-stress clicker. You don't need to do anything but click on the jelly, enjoying the process. During the game, you have an opportunity to get skins for the jelly or table, which will be notified by the Steam notification service. By clicking on the “inventory” button, you can replace the standard colors with those skins that you like more from the available ones. And if you want something new, you can always exchange skins with friends or use the opportunity provided by Steam!

In the game, you may:

  • Click on the jelly.

  • Contemplate the jelly without clicking on it.

  • Collect drops as in-game items, such as jelly and table skins.

  • Swap jelly and table skins.

  • Exchange skins with other players.

  • Utilize other Steam features related to skins!

Currently, there are over 50 table skins and 30 jelly skins of varying rarity in the game! To be able to get a skin drop inside the game, you need to launch it and wait for one minute. You can receive a new skin every 4 hours!

Chance of getting a skin depending on the rarity. Chance of drop out and the number of positions will change over time.

Items in the game now have these rarities::

  • Common.

  • Rare.

  • Unique.

  • Legendary.

  • Mythic.

  • Epic.

Q: Will there be achievements in the game?

A: Yes, there will be! We plan to add not only achievements but also other features: a leaderboard, competitions, a community workshop, new skins, and much more!

Q: Is it a scam?

A: No, it's a simple anti-stress clicker game. There is no scam involved, as the game is completely free for players. The drop of skins is determined solely by luck. We utilize Steam features, which is not a scam (player-to-player exchange and the Steam trading platform). We do not encourage or advise players against taking risky actions.

Q: Is the game going to close soon?

А: For those worried that the game might shut down: no need to worry, everything is under control! 😊 The game is hosted on Steam servers, so as long as the platform is running, the game will be available. We trust Steam, and we’re sure you do too. 😉

Q: What can I do with skins?

A: Everything that the game and Steam allow! You can collect them, showcase your collections in the game community, share them with friends, sell them on the Steam marketplace, and more.

highlighted.name: I've got the Universe's power right at my fingertips!
The mysteries of the Universe were revealed to me.
A penny saved is a penny earned.

name: Jellitito

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 5500 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 10500 / AMD Ryzen 7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Get ready for some sweet fun with our antistress Jellitito game! Just clicking to collect amazing skins and exchange them with other players. Build your collection of rare skins! It's simple, addictive, and endlessly enjoyable! Start clicking today!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Portuguese - Portugal*, French*, Russian*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*
*languages with full audio support
